trans-unit.source: Provides static utility methods for getting or setting the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> in an element tree.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于获取或设置的位置的静态实用工具方法<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>元素树中。

trans-unit.source: For most content element scenarios, the property <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> should be used instead of members of ContentOperations, if <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> is available.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数内容元素方案，该属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>如果应使用而不是成员 ContentOperations，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>可用。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent element of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的父元素<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Most practical <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are also a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 大多数实际<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>中派生类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>派生类</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>也是</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>

trans-unit.source: For these classes, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> property should be used instead.
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A> returns the parent element in the logical tree, which might not be the same element as returned by GetParent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>在逻辑树中，这可能不是同一个元素，返回 GetParent 返回父元素。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetParent exists specifically to correct for certain architectural issues whereby a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class that is not also a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> exists in a tree that is not strictly speaking either the logical tree or the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: GetParent 存在专门用于某些体系结构问题凭此更正<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>类，也不是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>并非严格意义上的逻辑树或可视化树的树中存在。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> to get the parent from.
The parent element in the current tree.
Sets the parent element of the provided <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置所提供的父元素<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to help define a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> hosting and content model on a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可帮助定义<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement><xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>的托管和内容模型</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> class uses this method internally to hook up its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> content property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>类在内部使用此方法挂钩其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>内容属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>
